description:
Add some lightweight warmth to your everyday arsenal with our prAna Patch Hoodie. Part of our bestselling prAna Basics collection, this versatile style is Fair Trade Certified™, meaning the breathably soft organic cotton and the facility it was made in are approved by Fair Trade USA.

On top of its sustainable, responsible design, this easy men's pullover is wonderful for another reason as well: it's a true all-season style. Perfect on its own during brisk summer nights or layered under outerwear when the mercury really drops.
name: Prana prAna Patch Hoodie - Mens
